contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Okres michalovce.png|thumb|right|300px|[[Michalovce District]] in the [[Kosice Region]]]] '''Zalužice''' is a [[village]] and [[municipality]] in [[Michalovce District]] in the [[Kosice Region]] of eastern Slovakia. ==History== In [[history|historical records]] the [[village]] was first mentioned in 1249. ==Geography== The [[village]] lies at an [[altitude]] of 127 metres and covers an [[area]] of 19.611 km². The [[municipality]] has a [[population]] of about 1140 people. ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html {{Michalovce District}} {{coord|48|45|39|N|21|59|39|E|source:skwiki_region:SK_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Villages and municipalities in Michalovce District]] {{Michalovce-geo-stub}}
